title: torchvision.transforms.ToTensor implicitly also divides by 255
body_html:
I was surprised that transforms.ToTensor() also divides by 255. This is documented
(http://pytorch.org/docs/master/torchvision/transforms.html#conversion-transforms) but is not apparent from the name. Should this be fixed (which would make the function more transpararent and usable for non-image data)?

Demo:

transform = transforms.ToTensor()
X = np.ones((3, 2, 2))
XX = transform(X)

XX looks like this:

(0 ,.,.) =
1.00000e-03 *
3.9216 3.9216
3.9216 3.9216
3.9216 3.9216

(1 ,.,.) =
1.00000e-03 *
3.9216 3.9216
3.9216 3.9216
3.9216 3.9216
[torch.FloatTensor of size 2x3x2]
